resources.string:
Every one searches for the BIG WHY. Why I have to wake up today and why I have to get out of bed this morning why I have to live till tomorrow. 
 I have found my BIG WHY in programming and applying science beside computer. 
 My passion is “CODING” sleepless night coding, solving problem and even find the bugs, 
 yes I love to be tired, be under work pressure and out of my comfort zone.

string-array.name: strength_list
string-array.item: End to end android developer, working throughout the entire lifecycle of building android apps. (System architecture like MVP-MVC, android components, Ui/Ux design, database design, Networking).
Data structure, how it builds and work and how to use all STL.
OOP concept specifically in C++, C# and JAVA and with knowledge of design pattern.
Can work with GUI in C++, C# or JAVA.
skills with problem solving, qualified to level three in ACM.
using Git, SVN and version control in general.
